commit message: Added preferences, code for handling, services, info to manifest
Fixed wifi on/off for screen on/off
Added alarm for delayed Wifi off

Added rule to only turn wifi back on when it had been turned off
previously by better Wifi on/off
Added Wifi on when power connected rule
Added rule to turn off wifi if no connection could be obtained
Value holders for the event log
Fixed event logging to be displayed properly
Added user option to clear event log
Added preferences to turn on/off events

Proper handling of alarms
Proper Wifi connection detection

Wifi on on screen on / unlocked prefs implemented as a toggle (only one
or none can be selected)

Sort events in descending order
Limit the number of events to 50
Look for the right license package
Correct texts for free / paid version
